physDesc.p: Fragments 1-16 (in mm), (1) 26 x 47, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (2) 28 x 21, (A) 4 lines, right margin, (B) blank, (3) 36 x 23, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 50 x 18, (A) 3 lines, bottom margin, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (5) 39 x 12, (A) 1 line, bottom margin, (B) blank, (6) 39 x 12, (A) 3 lines, top bottom (?) margin, (B) blank, (7) 25 x 40, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) traces, (8) 22 x 18, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) trace, (9) 20 x 13, (A) 2 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (10) 24 x 22, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 29 x 18, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (12) 30 x 14, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 25 x 20, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (14) 75 x 114, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (15) 27 x 94, (A) 2 lines, left bottom margins, (B) blank, (16) 60 x 43, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank
